translations: v.用竖琴弹奏；反复诉说；唠叨（harp 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: David told the leaders of the Levites to appoint their brothers as singers to sing joyful songs, accompanied by musical instruments: lyres, harps and cymbals.
sentences.translation: 大卫吩咐利未人的族长，派他们的弟兄作歌手，唱欢乐的歌曲，并用琴、瑟、钹这些乐器伴奏。

sentences.sentence: Yes one of those big angel-using harps.
sentences.translation: 是的，就是那种天使弹的大竖琴。

sentences.sentence: We won't lie around on clouds with halos playing harps!
sentences.translation: 我们不会躺在云端，头顶着光圈弹竖琴！
